Talk Functional Javascript: CVjs Meetup

18 Sep 2013 #scripting

Functional programming has been making the rounds lately with a lot of press. I had watched some awesome talks on functional Javascript, read the self proclaimed book Functional Javascript and in general was pretty excited to learn more about the topic. I proposed a meetup about functional Javascript hoping it would bring forward some nice discussions. As it turned out, it is still quite an emerging concept which resulted in me warbling for nearly and hour and a half!

If you are interested, here are the resources I used during the talk:

  • Demo Code
  • JSBin Playground
  • Slide Deck
  • Libraries: ScoreUnder and LambdaJs

It takes a community to learn and be productive. If you are interested in this kind of stuff, join us at #FunctionalJavascript on freenode!
